Package helper

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Destructible
    Interface for all classes which come with a fake destuctor (i.e. which need to do some cleanup)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRichTextReader
    Abstract class for reading all sorts of rich text
    AbstractRichTextReaderParagraph
    Abstract class which deals with rich text properties of entire paragraphs (justification, indentation, ...)
    ConsoleOutputFilter
    Helper class to filter console output from various (thread-) sources
    ConsoleOutputFilter.AllowedThreadOnlyOutputStream  
    Constants
    Non-instantiable helper class which defines global constants
    Constants.Generic
    Generic constants
    Constants.Internal
    Constants for internal use
    Constants.Internal.MSWord
    Constant characters to parse MS Word
    Constants.Links
    Constants related to SpecRelations (i.e. links betweeen requirements)
    Constants.MSWord
    Constants related to MS Word
    Constants.Specification
    Constants related to the actual specification (i.e. the subset026)
    Constants.Specification.SpecialConstructs
    Constructs in the specification which shall have special highlighting applied (use for the "implementerEnhanced" field in the ReqIF output)
    Constants.Traceability
    Constants related to Traceability strings
    CSSManager
    Stores and sorts CSS properties for use in element-styling
    CSSManagerTest
    Test the internal CSSManager
    DeferredLoggingHandler
    Logging Handler which caches all log events instead of forwarding them right away
    HashMap2D<K1,K2,V>
    Simple 2D version of a HashMap does not implement Map due to its simplicity
    HashMapWeakValue<K,V>
    HashMap whose values are weak referenced.
    ParallelExecutor
    Fire-and-forget parallel executor; uses runnables instead of callables to allow for exception propagation
    ParallelExecutor.ThreadPool
    wrapper class to ensure only our own thread pools are used
    TraceabilityManagerHumanReadable
    Creates human-readable trace strings and ensures a proper hierarchy of the individual components
    TraceabilityManagerHumanReadable.TraceTagItem
    Immutable class to store one concrete level in a traceTag
    XmlStringWriter
    This abstracts XMLStreamWriter and provides means to directly write to a string
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HTMLHelper
    HTML Tag names of common MS Word structures
    RegexHelper
    Various methods to deal with regex extraction
    RequirementHelper
    Helper class for requirement tree processing
    TableHelper
    Various helper functions to work with MS Word tables
    TraceabilityManagerHumanReadable.RowLevelPrefix
    Possible prefixes for rows in tables
    TraceabilityManagerHumanReadable.TagType
    type of a tracestring element
